review: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, who was using his guitar amp for volume to stream shows from his computer (which was obviously very annoying).  The Chromecast was the perfect solution for him! We use the Chromecast constantly - it is so easy to use. We also LOVE all of the photos displayed as the screensaver when nothing is streaming! The only downside is that it can be difficult to connect to wifi when you first get it, but it was definitely worth the 15 minutes of trouble.  The Chromecast is an amazing product that we use multiple times a week!
author: Stacey
